1.name: Love Story
1.description: A boy and a girl from different backgrounds fall in love regardless of their upbringing - and then tragedy strikes.

2.name: MASH
2.description: The staff of a Korean War field hospital use humor and high jinks to keep their sanity in the face of the horror of war.

3.name: The AristoCats
3.description: With the help of a smooth talking tomcat, a family of Parisian felines set to inherit a fortune from their owner try to make it back home after a jealous butler kidnaps them and leaves them in the country.

4.name: Chisum
4.description: Cattle baron John Chisum joins forces with Billy the Kid and Pat Garrett to fight the Lincoln County land war.

5.name: Patton
5.description: The World War II phase of the career of controversial American general George S. Patton.

6.name: Kelly's Heroes
6.description: A group of U.S. soldiers sneaks across enemy lines to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure.

7.name: El Topo
7.description: A mysterious black-clad gunfighter wanders a mystical Western landscape encountering multiple bizarre characters.

8.name: Catch-22
8.description: A man is trying desperately to be certified insane during World War II, so he can stop flying missions.

9.name: Airport
9.description: A bomber on board an airplane, an airport almost closed by snow, and various personal problems of the people involved.

10.name: Five Easy Pieces
10.description: A dropout from upper-class America picks up work along the way on oil rigs when his life isn't spent in a squalid succession of bars, motels, and other points of interest.

11.name: Rio Lobo
11.description: After the Civil War, Cord McNally searches for the traitor whose treachery caused the defeat of McNally's unit and the loss of a close friend.

12.name: Little Big Man
12.description: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.

13.name: Beyond the Valley of the Dolls
13.description: Three girls come to Hollywood to make it big, but find only sex, drugs and sleaze.

14.name: Tora! Tora! Tora!
14.description: In 1941, following months of economic embargo, Japan prepares to open its war against the United States with a surprise attack on the US naval base at Pearl Harbor.

15.name: Il conformista
15.description: A weak-willed Italian man becomes a fascist flunky who goes abroad to arrange the assassination of his old teacher, now a political dissident.

16.name: Two Mules for Sister Sara
16.description: Nun Sara (Shirley MacLaine) is on the run in Mexico and is saved from cowboys by Hogan (Clint Eastwood), who is preparing for a future mission to capture a French fort. The pair become good friends, but Sara never does tell him the true reason behind her being outlawed.

17.name: Valerie a týden divu
17.description: Inspired by fairy-tales such as Alice in Wonderland and Little Red-Riding Hood, "Valerie and her Week of Wonders" is a surreal tale in which love, fear, sex and religion merge into one fantastic world.

18.name: Zabriskie Point
18.description: At Zabriskie Point, United States' lowest point, two perfect strangers meet; an undergraduate dreamer and a young hippie student who start off an unrestrained romance, making love on the dusty terrain.

19.name: Performance
19.description: A violent gangster seeks refuge from the mob in the Bohemian home of a former rock star.

20.name: Ryan's Daughter
20.description: Set in the wake of the 1916 Easter Rising, a married woman in a small Irish village has an affair with a troubled British officer.

21.name: Lo chiamavano Trinità...
21.description: A lazy, unorthodox gunfighter and his portly, horse-thieving brother defend a Mormon settlement from a land-grabbing Major, a Mexican bandit, and their henchmen.

22.name: There Was a Crooked Man...
22.description: A charming but totally ruthless criminal is sent to a remote Arizona prison. He enlists the help of his cellmates in an escape attempt with the promise of sharing his hidden loot.

23.name: Hercules in New York
23.description: Hercules is sent to Earth where he finds true love and starts a promising career in the bodybuilder business.

24.name: Myra Breckinridge
24.description: After undergoing gender reassignment surgery, an aspiring actress travels to Hollywood, where she also wants to make a claim on her wealthy uncle's estate.

25.name: Le genou de Claire
25.description: On lakeside summer holiday, a conflicted older man is dared to have a flirt with two beautiful teenage stepsisters despite his betrothal to a diplomat's daughter and the fact that the girls have boyfriends.

26.name: Fragment of Fear
26.description: Reformed drug addict Tim Brett (David Hemmings) is vacationing in Italy with his aunt. When she is murdered, he tries to investigate, and soon his whole life is out of control.

27.name: Beneath the Planet of the Apes
27.description: The sole survivor of an interplanetary rescue mission searches for the only survivor of the previous expedition. He discovers a planet ruled by apes and an underground city run by telepathic humans.

28.name: Waterloo
28.description: Facing the decline of everything he has worked to obtain, conqueror Napoleon Bonaparte and his army confront the British at the Battle of Waterloo.

29.name: A Man Called Horse
29.description: In 1825, an English aristocrat is captured by Native Americans. He lives with them and begins to understand their way of life. Eventually, he is accepted as part of the tribe and aspires to become their leader.

30.name: The Railway Children
30.description: After the enforced absence of their father, three children move with their mother to Yorkshire, where during their adventures they attempt to discover the reason for his disappearance.

31.name: Joe
31.description: Two men, Bill, a wealthy conservative, and Joe, a far-right factory worker, form a dangerous bond after Bill confesses to murdering his daughter's drug dealer boyfriend to Joe.

32.name: Husbands
32.description: After the death of a common friend, three married men leave their lives together, seeking pleasure and freedom and ultimately leaving for London.

33.name: Le cercle rouge
33.description: After leaving prison, master thief Corey crosses paths with a notorious escapee and an alcoholic former policeman. The trio proceed to plot an elaborate heist.

34.name: C.C. & Company
34.description: Motorcycle mechanic C.C. Ryder joins "The Heads," an outlaw biker gang. Fellow gang members menace fashion journalist Ann when her limo breaks down in the desert, but C.C. comes to her ...                See full summary »

35.name: The Vampire Lovers
35.description: Seductive vampire Carmilla Karnstein and her family target the beautiful and the rich in a remote area of late eighteenth-century Gemany.

36.name: L'uccello dalle piume di cristallo
36.description: An American expatriate in Rome witnesses an attempted murder. He learns later that it's connected to an ongoing murder spree in the city, and decides to do his own investigation, despite being personally targeted by the killer.

37.name: The Twelve Chairs
37.description: In 1920s Soviet Russia, a fallen aristocrat, a priest and a con artist search for a treasure of jewels hidden inside one of twelve dining chairs, lost during the revolution.

38.name: The Dunwich Horror
38.description: Wilbur Whateley travels to the Arkham Miskatonic University to borrow the legendary Necronomicon. But, little does anyone know, Whateley isn't quite human...

39.name: Cromwell
39.description: Oliver Cromwell can no longer tolerate King Charles' policies, and the self-interest of the ruling class, and leads a civil war to install Parliament as the ultimate ruler of England.

40.name: Taste the Blood of Dracula
40.description: Three distinguished English gentlemen accidentally resurrect Count Dracula, killing a disciple of his in process. The Count seeks to avenge his dead servant, by making the trio die in the hands of their own children.

41.name: There's a Girl in My Soup
41.description: TV personality Robert Danvers, an exceedingly vain rotter, seduces young women daily, never staying long with one. He meets his match in Marion, an American, 19, who's available but refuses...                See full summary »

42.name: De Sade 70
42.description: An innocent girl goes to spend the weekend on an island with a woman and her brother, but soon she finds herself entangled in a web of dream-like sexual experiments.

43.name: Brewster McCloud
43.description: An introverted loner living in the bowels of the Astrodome plots to develop - with the aid of a mysterious guardian angel - a pair of wings that will help him fly.

44.name: Roxanna
44.description: The omnisexual nature of the nineteen-year-old debauchee, Roxanna, is dragging her into a world of hedonism and sensual self-indulgence; however, her sanity is at stake. Is there an escape from the mind's dark prison?

45.name: When Dinosaurs Ruled the Earth
45.description: Set in the ancient past when humans and dinosaurs lived together, a small tribe is struggling to survive by giving a sacrifice of a blond woman to their god, the sun, in return for ...                See full summary »

46.name: Bloody Mama
46.description: A psychologically-disturbed matriarch presides over her damaged family of bank-robbing misfits.

47.name: Twinky
47.description: A 38 year old American novelist discovers the difficulties of being married to a British 16 year old schoolgirl.

48.name: The Private Life of Sherlock Holmes
48.description: When a bored Holmes eagerly takes the case of Gabrielle Valladon after an attempt on her life, the search for her missing husband leads to Loch Ness and the legendary monster.

49.name: The Ballad of Cable Hogue
49.description: A hobo accidentally stumbles onto a water spring, and creates a profitable way station in the middle of the desert.

50.name: Scream and Scream Again
50.description: A serial killer who drains his victims' blood is on the loose in London. The police follow him to a house owned by an eccentric scientist.
